com.compendium.ui
Class UIDesktopManager

java.lang.Object
  javax.swing.DefaultDesktopManager
      com.compendium.ui.UIDesktopManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.DesktopManager
public class UIDesktopManager
extends javax.swing.DefaultDesktopManager

This subclass of DefaultDesktopManager is to fix a Mac bug with closing frames. Also it has code from Gerald Nunn to activate scrollbars when frame dragged off right/bottom

Author:
Michelle Bachler / Gerald Nunn
See Also:
